DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES WITH REGARD TO THIS 
SOFTWARE INCLUDING ALL IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF

OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE USE OR PERFORMANCE 
OF THIS SOFTWARE.

================================================

         ---!!!INSTRUCTIONS!!!---

ONLY USE THESE FILES IF AN ERROR POPS UP SAYING 
YOU NEED THEM!!!

FOLLOW THE FOLDER FORMATS AND YOU SHOULD BE GOOD.

EXAMPLE:
C:/Windows/System32/msvcp140d.dll 
WOULD BE:
~/System32/msvcp140d.dll

EXAMPLE:
C:/Windows/SYSWOW64/msvcp140d.dll
WOULD BE:
~/SysWOW64/msvcp140d.dll
